params.userBorrowIndex: The borrow index when user borrowed

params.userShares: The amount of yield-bearing tokens user holds

params.borrowedValue: Total borrowed value in base currency
params.collateralValue: Total collateral value in base currency

returns._0: Health factor scaled by 1e18 (1e18 = 1.0, below 1e18 = liquidatable)
Borrow rate in basis points per year (e.g., 500 = 5% APR)
maxBorrowAmount The maximum amount that can be borrowed

returns.borrowAPY: Current borrow APY in basis points
returns.supplyAPY: Current supply APY in basis points
returns.totalBorrow: Total assets borrowed from the pool
returns.totalSupply: Total assets supplied to the pool
returns.utilizationRate: Current utilization rate in basis points

returns._0: Supply rate in basis points per year

returns.currentSupplyAPY: The current supply APY in basis points
returns.underlyingValue: The current value in underlying tokens
returns.yieldTokenBalance: The amount of yield-bearing tokens held

returns.isLiquidatable: True if position can be liquidated

updateIndices().details: Should be called before any state-changing operation (borrow, repay, deposit, withdraw)

calculateCurrentDebt(uint256,uint256).notice: Calculate a user's current debt including accrued interest

calculateCurrentDeposit(uint256).notice: Calculate a user's current deposit value including accrued interest

calculateHealthFactor(uint256,uint256).notice: Calculate health factor for a position

getAssetMultiplier(address).notice: get asset multiplier against base token

getBorrowRate().notice: Calculate current borrow rate based on utilization

getMaxBorrowAmount(uint256,address).notice: Get maximum borrow amount for a user given collateral

isPositionLiquidatable(address,address).notice: Check if a position is liquidatable

updateBorrowIndex().notice: Update the borrow index based on time elapsed and current borrow rate

updateOracle(address,uint256).notice: updates the asset's multiplier allowing for borrowing using different assets as collateral

updateSupplyIndex().notice: Update the supply index based on time elapsed and current supply rate
